title: PPC Specialist
job_overview:
Qualifications
• 1-3 years experience managing consumer brands on Amazon Seller Central
• Experience with Google Ads and Facebook and Upgrade to see actual info Ads is a plus
• Deep understanding of keyword research
• Demonstrated ability to translate client needs into actionable deliverables
• Ability to analyze and develop advertising strategies, products, and trends
• Ability to work both independently and as part of a team
• Ability to communicate clearly and concisely, verbally and in writing
• Results-oriented and self-motivated
• Ability to balance multiple priorities and meet deadlines

Responsibilities
• Plan, develop, and implement comprehensive strategies to increase sales, visibility, brand recognition and drive sales
• Perform daily account management and optimization of pay per click accounts
• Monitor ranking performance daily and adjust campaigns accordingly
• Provide recommendations and execute strategies for keyword opportunities, campaign structuring, targeting, and other facets of paid search in accordance with the company goals
• Coordinating with the Managers to ensure task completion
• Constant learning of what is working on Amazon, the competitive landscape, and new features
